definitions.title: n.pr.gent. et terr.
definitions.body: Kasdim = Chaldeans, Chaldes, LXX Xaldai=oi and (Je 50:10) h( Xaldai/a (As. (mat) Kaldu, Kaldû fr. earlier (Bab.) form [* Kašdu]—š before dental becoming l, Dl:Par 128 f. 200 f.; As. Gr. § 51, 3; Schr:KGF 94ff.; COT on Ge 11:28);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: people dwelling on lower Euphrates and Tigris; in n.pr.loc. ´[[אוּר כ]] Ge 11:28 (J), v:Ge 11:31 (P), Ge 15:7 (J), Ne 9:7.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: Chaldeans, as learned class, skilled in interpretations Da 2:2 (+ [[חַרְטֻמִּים]] [[אַשָּׁפִים]] [[מְכַשְּׁפִים]]), v:Da 2:4.

Chaldea, [[וְהָֽיְתָה כַּשְׂדִּים לְשָׁלָל]] Je 50:10 and Chaldea shall be despoiled; ´[[יוֹשְׁבֵי כ]] Je 51:24, Je 51:35; [[כַּשְׂדִּים אֶרֶץ מוֹלַדְתָּם]] Ez Eze 23:15; c. [[ה]] loc.: [[כַּשְׂדִּ֫ימָה]] Ez Eze 11:24, Eze 16:29, Eze 23:16.
